SEARCH

Package controller

package controller
Provides the classes and methods responsible for managing the various operations in the Hospital Management System (HMS). The controller package acts as the intermediary between the model (data) and the view, processing user inputs and updating the system state accordingly.
Since:
1.0
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminstratorManager
    The AdministratorManager class provides functionality for managing staff and patients, including adding, removing, and retrieving staff based on specific criteria.
    AppointmentManager
    The AppointmentManager class provides methods for scheduling, viewing, rescheduling, and canceling appointments, as well as handling appointment requests and recording outcomes.
    DoctorManager
    The DoctorManager class provides methods for managing doctor-related operations, such as viewing and managing availability, medical records, and appointments.
    InventoryManager
    The InventoryManager class provides methods for managing the inventory of medicines, including checking stock levels, dispensing, updating stock, and handling replenishment requests.
    MedicalRecordManager
    Manages the operations related to medical records, including printing and updating records.
    PatientManager
    Manages patient-related operations, including retrieving medical records and updating personal information.
    PharmacistManager
    Manages pharmacist-related operations, including viewing inventory, submitting replenishment requests, and updating prescription statuses.
    ScheduleManager
    Manages scheduling-related operations for doctors, including printing their schedules and personal availability.
    UserManager
    Manages user-related operations such as validating users and resetting passwords.
